actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to set forth qualifications for the offices of Attorney General of the United States and Deputy Attorney General.

summary.text: Prohibits any person who has held a leading partisan position in the election of a President (national campaign manager, national chairman of the finance committee or chairman of the national political party) from being appointed by such President as U.S. Attorney General or Deputy Attorney General.

titles.title: A bill to set forth qualifications for the offices of Attorney General of the United States and Deputy Attorney General.
